title: *TORI SHIN
seo_description: Chef Atsushi Kono sources only the finest chicken for some of the best yakitori outside of Japan. Order by the skewer or a full chicken omakase to get a true yakitori experience. Chef’s passion to incorporate the whole animal in a simple and delicious way is what makes this perfectly unexpected Uptown dining experience so memorable.
contents:
Sot l'y laisse (chicken oyster) skewer
362 W 53rd St
walk: 7 minutes

Chef Atsushi Kono sources only the finest chicken for some of the best yakitori outside of Japan. Order by the skewer or a full chicken omakase to get a true yakitori experience. Chef’s passion to incorporate the whole animal in a simple and delicious way is what makes this perfectly unexpected Uptown dining experience so memorable.
